tasks.title: FDF Question Not Persisting Locally
tasks.description: FDF question (Same Elevation, Different Elevation) is now syncing, but it is not persisting in the local data. If I answer the question and go out and back in to a room the question is not answered. After sync the question answer comes back.
acceptance_criteria: Same/Different Elevation dropdown value persists locally after selection
Value is still visible when navigating out and back into a room
Value does not require sync to be visible locally

tasks.title: FDF Photo Syncing Failing - entityId.startsWith Error
tasks.description: FDF photo syncing is failing with console error: TypeError: ue.entityId.startsWith is not a function. This occurs in the BackgroundSync process when attempting to sync FDF photos.
tasks.error_log: [BackgroundSync] Sync failed: TypeError: ue.entityId.startsWith is not a function at main.6eefdef0138008d6.js:1:2854848
acceptance_criteria: FDF photos sync successfully without errors
Photos are uploaded to Caspio backend correctly
